subject: Order
description_text: Hello, good morning, I have just placed an order, and I realized afterwards that I did not include the haptic vibration system. I would like to know if it is still possible to add the haptic vibration system to my order so that the setup is complete. Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could inform me about the estimated delivery schedule for this order. Thank you very much for your help. Kind regards, Sent by my iPhone Missatge enviat per SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> el dia 28 des. 2025 a les 21:34: ﻿ SIMSONN ORDER #SSN5459 Thank you for your purchase! We're getting your order ready to be shipped. We will notify you when it has been sent. View your order or Visit our store Order summary Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional × 1 Plus X P3-H3 / Silver / without Baseplate UP25 (-€21,66) €214,95 €193,29 Subtotal €193,29 Shipping €8,95 Taxes €0,00 Total €202,24 EUR You saved €21,66 Customer information Shipping address Javier Domingo Manero Heliswiss Ibérica, s.a. 08205 Sabadell Barcelona Spain Billing address Javier Domingo Manero Heliswiss Ibérica, s.a. 08205 Sabadell Barcelona Spain Payment Paypal Shipping method Economy Shipping Sent by my iPhone

合并来自工单9428  
      主题: Re: Order #SSN5459 confirmed  
      描述:  Hello, good morning, 
 
 
 
 I have just placed an order, and I realized afterwards that I did not include the haptic vibration system. 
 
 
 
 I would like to know if it is still possible to add the haptic vibration system to my order so that the setup is complete. Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could inform me about the estimated delivery schedule for this order. 
 
 
 
 Thank you very much for your help. 
 
 
 
 Kind regards,

El mié, 31 dic 2025 a las 9:43, support@simsonn.com (

Hi Xavi Domingo,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. If you need to add additional haptics, we'll only charge the price difference—no need to pay the full price separately. Hope this helps. In any case, Happy New Year!

No, my trust on you is zero. I want to return the pedals

El mié, 31 dic 2025 a las 10:49, support@simsonn.com (

Hi Xavi Domingo,    We apologize for the delayed response. You may return the package to our German warehouse, and we will process your refund upon receipt and inspection. Please ensure the packaging remains intact and the product shows no signs of use, otherwise the return request will not be approved.  Gubitz GmbH (LeiXuan A211)  Hüttenkamp 12  Neumünster, Schleswig-Holstein 24536  +49 17622233089

Dear Sir, 
 
 Thank you for your reply. 
 
 However, I would like to clarify that it does not make sense for the package to be sent to Spain and then returned by me to Germany, as this would generate unnecessary shipping costs for both parties. 
 
 The most logical and efficient solution would be for you to stop and retain the shipment at your German warehouse, before it is delivered, and proceed directly with the refund. This would avoid additional transport costs from Germany to Spain and then back to Germany. 
 
 I kindly ask you, please, to block and stop this shipment at your German warehouse and process the refund accordingly. 
 
 Thank you very much for your understanding and cooperation. 
 
 Best regards, Missatge enviat per support@simsonn.com el dia 4 gen. 2026 a les 11:08: ﻿
